justification: Candidate has strong business development experience but lacks specific business intelligence tools mentioned in the job description.
Has experience in customer success and sales but no direct mention of C++, HTML, CSS.
Lack of specific digital marketing or programming skills relevant to the JD.
Possesses strong communication and interpersonal skills which meet minimum requirements.

micro_scores.criteria: business intelligence tools (power bi, sql, tableau)

requirements.criteria: Experience with business intelligence tools such as Power BI, SQL, and Tableau
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business, or a related field

input.job_description:
## Lead Generation and Business Intelligence Specialist

Join **Innovate Connections Inc.** as a Lead Generation and Business Intelligence Specialist. You will play a pivotal role in driving business growth by spearheading lead generation initiatives and providing strategic insights through data analytics. We are looking for a highly skilled professional with a strong background in lead generation, data management, and business intelligence.

### Key Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute lead generation strategies using digital marketing techniques, cold calling, and data scraping tools.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to optimize customer acquisition strategies.
- Utilize CRM systems to manage and analyze client data for lead qualification.
- Create and manage detailed project schedules and work plans, utilizing best practices and standards for project execution.
- Develop financial models and business growth strategies based on data insights.
- Utilize tools such as Power BI, SQL, and Tableau for developing comprehensive data reports and dashboards.

### Desired Skills and Experience:
- Strong programming skills in C++, HTML, and CSS.
- Proficiency in digital marketing, email marketing, and social media platforms.
- Experience in managing large data sets and using BI tools (Power BI, Excel, Tableau).
- Excellent communication skills and ability to develop strong client relationships.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

### Why Innovate Connections Inc.?
- We innovate at the forefront of technology and enable our team members to grow alongside the company.
- We value data-driven decision-making and empower our teams with the right tools to succeed.
- Offering a supportive work environment and opportunities for career advancement.

### How to Apply:
Submit your resume and cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you are interested in joining Innovate Connections Inc.
input.additional_info: Innovate Connections Inc. prefers candidates from recognized universities such as the University of Management & Technology and Lahore School of Economics. We encourage a remote working environment but require physical presence for team-building and strategic sessions twice a quarter. Relocation assistance is available for exceptional candidates. Our comprehensive assessment includes a technical test followed by structured interviews to evaluate both technical and soft skills comprehensively.
minimum_requirements: Experience with business intelligence tools such as Power BI, SQL, and Tableau
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business, or a related field

details.name: Ali Imran Sherwani
details.executive_summary: Ali Imran Sherwani is an accomplished Development Manager with a strong background in business development and customer success. He has demonstrated expertise in managing customer relationships and achieving sales goals through innovative strategies and effective communication. His technical skills include proficiency in Microsoft Office applications, which he utilizes to enhance operational efficiency and drive business growth.

employment_history.details: Reached out to potential customers via telephone, email, and in-person inquiries. Performed BIDS on different portals like Unison, SamGov & GSA eBuy for US Federal Government. Achieved sales goals and service targets by cultivating and securing new customer relationships. Identified and pursued valuable business opportunities to generate new company revenue and improve bottom line profit. Generated new business with marketing initiatives and strategic plans. Established relationships with key decision-makers within customer's organization to promote growth and retention. Developed process to analyze customer feedback to incorporate insights into product development strategies. Negotiated and closed long-term agreements with new clients in assigned territory. Performed client research and identified opportunities for account growth, account penetration and market expansion.

Managed over 50 Calls per Day. Lead Generation for SEO Services (Search Engine Optimization) from USA, CANADA, AUSTRALIA. Led process improvement and problem-solving efforts to create standard procedures and escalation policy for customer support team. Monitored metrics and developed actionable insights to improve efficiency and performance. Conducted training and mentored team members to promote productivity, accuracy, and commitment to friendly service. Played instrumental role in client satisfaction by working with operational teams for proper resolution of service issues. Conducted periodic user training sessions to support customer understanding and product feature utilization. Assisted customers with onboarding and product setup to foster successful adoption and usage. Collaborated with sales and product teams to address customer success objectives. Generated reports and communicated results to stakeholders to provide insights into customer success.

Prepared agendas and took notes at meetings to archive proceedings. Screened and transferred incoming calls, took down messages, and transmitted information and documents to internal personnel. Aided colleagues, managers, and customers through regular communication and assistance. Processed purchase orders, service contracts and financial reports. Created, prepared, and delivered reports to various departments. Set priorities and problem-solved workflow issues to maintain rapport with customers and managers. Managed daily payment processing and drafted related financial documents. Entered and maintained departmental records in company database.

Providing introductory information to new customers. Ensuring that customers are satisfied with products or services. Following up with clients or customers to check that they're still satisfied with any purchases. Letting customers or clients know about additional products or services. Escalating queries and concerns. Troubleshooting common issues with a product or service. Resolve issues of the customer timely.

Managed technical integration, systems engineering program management, customer support and program management. Prepared cost estimates and bid documents by studying customer RFPs and consulting with project managers. Submitted booking forecasts, monthly highlights and CRM entries. Gained customer acceptance by demonstrating cost reductions and operations improvements. Contributes to sales engineering effectiveness by identifying short-term and long-range issues and recommending courses of action. Delivered technical sales presentations to prospects and presented benefits and value of products. Analyzed market trends, competitor performance and product strengths.
